data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Brunei and Muara, Brunei will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Brunei and Muara, Brunei
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Brunei and Muara to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

data.section_summary: On average, 51 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Brunei and Muara, Brunei.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, remind your church in Brunei and Muara that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 55 new simple churches in the state of Brunei and Muara, Brunei. Place a simple church in every community of the 279,900 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Belait, Lakiput people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Belait, Lakiput people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Belait, Lakiput people is yours.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Brunei and Muara, Brunei.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Brunei and Muara, Brunei to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Brunei and Muara, Brunei the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

location.name: Brunei and Muara
location.people_groups_list: Han Chinese, Mandarin, Brunei Malay, Kedayan, Brunei Malay, Kedayan, Sea Dayak, Iban, Sinhalese
